alert.note: Alert for Elko (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 25 at 4:36AM PDT until further notice by NWS Elko
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Elko NV has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Nevada... Bruneau River At Rowland affecting Elko County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...The river is expected to remain near the minor flood stage of 7.0 feet today, with higher flows possible later this week. * WHERE...Bruneau River At Rowland. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Minor flooding of Forest Service roads. Recreational use becomes limited. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:10 AM PDT Tuesday the stage was 6.9 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 430 PM PDT.
